scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:env
scripts.dev: npm run dev:del_tsbuild && nodemon --exec "npm run build:server && npm run web"
scripts.dev:del_tsbuild: npx -y rimraf server/dist/ && npx -y rimraf server/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.web: cd server/dist && node --inspect --trace-warnings -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=../.env
scripts.prod: cd server/dist && node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=../.env.prod
scripts.localstack:s3: npx -y cross-env DEFAULT_REGION=eu-central-1 awslocal s3 mb s3://tronikel
scripts.localstack:ses: npx -y cross-env DEFAULT_REGION=eu-central-1 awslocal ses verify-domain-identity --domain tronikel.training
scripts.localstack:sns: npx -y cross-env DEFAULT_REGION=eu-central-1 awslocal sns create-topic --name tronikel-sns
scripts.localstack: npm run localstack:s3 && npm run localstack:ses && npm run localstack:sns && npm run seed
